title: Is the iPhone XR better than the iPhone 11 in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: No way !!! XR is one of the most over-rated phones from Apple only because it’s cheaper than other iPhones. Specifically comparing to 11:- LCD Screen compared to OledWeaker / Less efficient batteryweaker processorInferior camera

Nope, iphone 11 is much better than iPhone XR in many ways, the processor in iPhone is much faster than the one in iPhone XR. the cameras also have been improved very beautiful! iPhone XR has a single 12 MP wide angle camera while the iPhone 11 has dual 12 MP wide angle and ultra wide angle camera! Even the battery is much better in iPhone 11.
